1. NASA warns 'bus-sized' asteroid set to skim Earth at 30,000mph  Daily Express US
  2. Asteroid threat? A giant, 44-foot, house-sized space rock approaching Earth tomorrow; here's what NASA...  Moneycontrol
  3. NASA Tracking Bus-Size Asteroid Approaching Earth at 30,000 Mph  Newsweek
  4. NASA warns of bus-sized, 100-foot asteroids approaching Earth: Check date and other details  The Economic Times
  5. 'Speed of 25,000 kmph': NASA detects Asteroid 2025 BH2 coming close to Earth, will it collide?  WION

item.title: NASA Faces a Critical Issue That Could Jeopardize All Future SpaceX Missions - Jason Deegan
